changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE application.users_roles( user_id bigint NOT NULL, role_id bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT users_roles_pk PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id), CONSTRAINT users_roles_roles_fk FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES application.roles (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT users_roles_users_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
